message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think we can do better.  I'll take 60% and leave you 40%.  This is a fair offer given the declining value of the money.
I'm not comfortable with the 60/40 split. I think I can do better than that.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than 40%. This is my revised offer.
